remarks: Proof of a single axiom that can replace ~ ax-c5 , ~ ax-c7 , and ~ ax-11 in a subsystem that includes these axioms plus ~ ax-c4 and ~ ax-gen (and propositional calculus).  See ~ axc5c711toc5 , ~ axc5c711toc7 , and ~ axc5c711to11 for the re-derivation of those axioms.  This theorem extends the idea in Scott Fenton's ~ axc5c7 .  (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2006.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: axc5c711 $p |- ( ( A. x A. y -. A. x A. y ph -> A. x ph ) -> ph ) $.
